data.text:
@halelaiwa Hey!
If you contact us on messenger with your booking reference, we can check the rules that apply to your ticket.

We’re openening new routes to the Canary Islands✈️ As the demand for travel continues to increase, we now start two new routes to the Canary Islands, direct flights to Tenerife from Stockholm and to Gran Canaria from Gothenburg.

#flysas #wearetravelers #canaryislands https://t.co/9KKvXxopiX

data.text:
@MikaelSkillt Hej! Det kan jag gärna göra, vilket datum var det du flög på så jag kan se till att rätt värdinna får din fina feedback? Var det den 04 Augusti 2021?
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@MikaelSkillt Hej, vi är ledsen över att det var problem under din flygning. När din resa är avslutad kan du kontakta Customer Care för att få hjälp med ersättning, se även till att du sparar alla kvitton på de utlägg du hade: https://t.co/OzrIxYNv63 
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@brzezsam98 Hi, I am sorry to hear that you are having issues with your voucher. Please contact our Customer Service by Facebook Messenger, Live Chat or by phone so that we can have a look at what is going on.  https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj 
Kind regards, Rebecka
@xTemerz Hi! you can bring the  laptop itself to use it during the flight! as long as you do not bring an additional carry-on bag. Kind regards, Jonna.

@carol11991 Hi! If you would like to bring a stroller onboard, it must be within the dimensions and weight limits for cabin baggage. You cannot bring any additional cabin baggage.

The maximum dimensions for cabin baggage are 23 x 40 x 55 cm with a maximum weight of 8 kg.

@jfischerm Hej, 

Vi har inget eget krav att ha test för Covid utan det kommer att bero på om de Danska myndigheterna har krav på det vid tidpunkten för resan.

Hälsningar,
Peter

urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text:
@peterstanners Hi,
Complaints and feedback is sent in to our customer care through their feedback form  https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh

Regards,
Peter

urls.title: SAS | Entry requirements for your trip
urls.description: Find up-to-date entry requirements for your trip.

data.text:
@Pherlman Hi,

Entry restrictions and requirement for tests are decided by the authorities in a country. The latest information we have received is available at https://t.co/YhT9mVc7De

Regards,
Peter

@YarnAddictAnni Hi, 
FFP2 masks are ok to use. Face masks that are allowed on board include single-use masks of FFP2, KN95, N95 standards or surgical masks such as IIR or similar. 

Regards,
Peter

urls.title: SAS | Entry requirements for your trip
urls.description: Find up-to-date entry requirements for your trip.

data.text:
Do you know which entry requirements apply for your travel? By filling in your details here, we show you everything that applies for you and your trip✈️

Make sure to stay updated on any changes in the requirements before your travel. Welcome onboard!💙

https://t.co/YhT9mVc7De https://t.co/0kJDlFuPPV

data.text:
@YarnAddictAnni Hello! Face masks that are allowed on board include single-use masks of FFP2, KN95, N95 standards or surgical masks such as IIR or similar.

Protection made out of cloth, visors or covers with ventilation valves are not permitted on board.

Best regards,
Anton.

urls.title: Baggage
Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text: @staralliance Thank you, @staralliance! 💙

August 1st marks our 75th anniversary. Thank you, for traveling with us for 75 years! We are looking forward to welcoming you on board our flights today, tomorrow and for many more years to come. 🇩🇰🇳🇴🇸🇪 #flysas #SAS75 #wearetravelers https://t.co/4S87OJX0X1

@davee852 Hej! Väntetiden på kundtjänst är dessvärre länge än vanligt just nu och vi ber om ursäkt för det. I nuläget kan jag dock inte rekommendera något annat än att du kontaktar oss igen och väntar i kö, du kommer att kopplas till en agent så fort det är din tur i kön.

// Anton.

data.text: @acertainellen Hi! if you do not find any information you need to contact your local authorities or the respective country's embassy and ask them for information. SAS does not require anything, it is the country you are going to or through that can do it. Kind regards, Jonna.

data.text:
@Mars67616268 Hi, have you tried clearing cache and cookies to see if you are able to create your booking on our website? If you still experience issues, please contact us by phone so we can assist you making your booking. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

@AndrewR69685026 Hi! It depends on what you need assistance with. If you need help with finding alternatives for your booking or need assistance with payment services you will need to contact us by phone. Most other things we can assist you over the chat as well as by phone
Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@oliviayyli Hi, I am sorry to hear that you have not yet received your refund. You can take this further by making a claim with our Customer care department. You can do so here: https://t.co/wprQ9Zejqh
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Contact Us – Find Your Local Telephone Number
urls.description: If you need to get in touch with us, you will find here local telephone numbers to Customer Service, SAS Corporate Sales Center and SAS Group Sales »

data.text:
@Filosophation Hi, I am sorry to hear that you are still waiting for your refund. Please contact our support so that we can have a look into this for you. You can contact us by Live Chat, Phone or by Facebook messenger. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

@ljung75 Hej, vi ber om ursäkt över de långa väntetiderna för att komma fram till vår support just nu. Det är många som kontaktar oss vilket gör att vi har längre väntetider än vanligt. Vi jobbar så snabbt vi kan för att hjälpa alla så snart som möjligt.
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

data.text: @JannicaHoney Hi Jannica!  If you are waiting on a refund you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at your booking there and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.

@AndrewR69685026 Hi Andrew! If you are waiting on a refund you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at your booking there and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.

@dancefortheworm Hi! If you are waiting on a refund you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at your booking there and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.

data.text:
@BetinaFigen Hi, 

We that work with social media  do not have access to the baggage systems used at the airport. Please contact baggage service to check status on your baggage. https://t.co/ZV9bTO3uo2

Regards,
Peter

@GeolierMathilde Hi, 

The possibilities for a voucher depends on the type of voucher. I can not check on a voucher number here on twitter so i can not check what applies to your voucher. You need to contact our support for info on possibilities. 

Regards,
Peter

urls.title: Carry On Baggage – Size and Weight Limits
urls.description: You can always bring one carry-on bag (8 kg) and one personal item in the cabin free of charge. Your allowance depends on your travel class »

data.text:
@anvikawolf Hi, you are allowed to bring 1 personal item or carry on luggage into the cabin. This one bag or item may be up to 55 cm x 40 cm x 23 cm and weigh up to 8kg. You can find more information here: https://t.co/2UUXPRN2w1
Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Baggage

data.text:
@Sigrid_S Hej, 
Om ungdomsbiljetterna inte skulle ha separata regler så skulle de inte kunna prissättas med rabatterade priser eller ha en lägre ombokningsavgift än de vanliga biljetterna. 

Hälsningar,
Peter

@Sigrid_S Hej Sigrid, 

Alla passagerare i en bokning behöver vara bokade på biljetter som har samma biljettregler och priser. Ungdomsbiljetter har egna regler och priser, så de kan inte kombineras i samma bokning som de vanliga biljetterna.

Hälsningar,
Peter
